title: This Week's Top Stories - Sexual Harassment in the Metaverse & Eric Adams Secretly Eats Fish
itunes:title: This Week's Top Stories - Sexual Harassment in the Metaverse & Eric Adams Secretly Eats Fish
description:
Facebook's Metaverse users experience virtual sexual harassment, New York City Mayor Eric Adams's veganism is called into question, Ronny Chieng and Roy Wood Jr. talk sports, and more.
